title: Dark Orchestral Fantasy Music Collection
description: 20 Tracks of cinematic orchestral music for fantasy RPG or action/adventure games.
longDescription:
This is the full collection from my music asset packs "Desolate Kingdom" and "Pantheon". Youtube preview videos for "Desolate Kingdom" HERE and "Pantheon" HERE

Full tracks can also be heard on SOUNDCLOUD and YOUTUBE


This asset pack includes 20 tracks of cinematic orchestral fantasy music: 1 hour of loopable content with multiple variations. All loops are coded and ready to be incorporated into your project with the new Unreal 5 sample-accurate MetaSounds engine. Intros transition seamlessly into looping tracks without pops or clicks.


Note: Unreal version 4 assets are available, but will not include MetaSounds. Version 4 will only include .WAV and Sound Cue files. MetaSounds is only included in Unreal 5.0 or later, and must be activated in plugins.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  20 fully looping orchestral tracks with multiple variations
  •  Detailed orchestral music for fantasy settings
  •  MetaSounds codes are included for all loops for seamless intro transitions into looping segments.

Number of Audio Wavs: 94

Number of Audio Cues: 94

Number of MetaSounds: 70 (these combine intro and looping Wavs into ready-to-use code)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 60 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Important/Additional Notes: Use of MetaSounds codes require Unreal Engine 5.0.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Added no voices version of Siren's Song.
Added no voices version of Siren's Song.
